messages.title: Labour will rebuild an NHS with the time to care:
messages.content: Labour's plan includes hiring 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, a guarantee for GP appointments within 48 hours and cancer test results within a week, and bringing in 5,000 more care-workers to join up care from homes to hospitals.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in training and recruiting 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs to ensure the NHS has time to care for you and your family.
Guarantee a maximum 48 hours waiting time for GP appointments and one week for cancer test results.
Hire 5,000 more care-workers to join up services from home to hospital to ensure more efficient care and better patient outcomes.

issues.health: Labour plans to end the worsening crisis in the NHS seen under the Conservative Government, with investments in staff and guaranteeing quicker service.

leaflet.personalStatement: Building the NHS was one of our greatest achievements as a country. Only a Labour government can ensure that the NHS will always be there for you and your family.

contactInformation.address: The Labour Party One Brewer’s Green London SW1H 0RH

quotes.text: As you may have seen in the news recently, in every part of the country more people are having to wait longer at A&E and for important tests. None of our manifesto commitments require any extra borrowing.

images.caption: Labour will rebuild an NHS with the time to care: 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, guarantee that no one waits more than 48 hours for a GP appointment or 1 week for cancer test results, 5,000 more care-workers to join up care from homes to hospitals.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on NHS issues and does not mention the election date or detailed contact information other than website and address. No specific mentions of social media were found.
